title: When I use LSTM encoder, it comes across warning problem
body:
It comes across warning problem when I run the following script:
```
python3 finetune/run_classifier.py --pretrained_model_path models/cluecorpussmall_lstm_lm_model.bin \
                                   --vocab_path models/google_zh_vocab.txt \
                                   --config_path models/rnn_config.json \
                                   --train_path datasets/douban_book_review/train.tsv \
                                   --dev_path datasets/douban_book_review/dev.tsv \
                                   --test_path datasets/douban_book_review/test.tsv \
                                   --learning_rate 1e-3 --batch_size 64 --epochs_num 5 \
                                   --pooling mean
```
Warning:
```
/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/RNN.cpp:1266: UserWarning: RNN module weights are not part of single contiguous chunk of memory. This means they need to be compacted at every call, possibly greatly increasing memory usage. To compact weights again call flatten_parameters().
/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/RNN.cpp:1266: UserWarning: RNN module weights are not part of single contiguous chunk of memory. This means they need to be compacted at every call, possibly greatly increasing memory usage. To compact weights again call flatten_parameters().
/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/RNN.cpp:1266: UserWarning: RNN module weights are not part of single contiguous chunk of memory. This means they need to be compacted at every call, possibly greatly increasing memory usage. To compact weights again call flatten_parameters().
```
